孾字的基本解释

孾
yīng
古同“婴”。

孾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīng］
［《廣韻》於盈切，平清，影。］
亦作“孆1”。亦作“孾1”。“婴1”的繁体字。
(1)颈饰。
(2)系；穿戴。
(3)绕；围绕。
(4)纠缠；羁绊。
(5)遭受；遇。
(6)接触；触犯。
(7)施加。
(8)初生的女孩。
(9)泛指初生儿。
(10)通“纓”。套在马颈上的革带。
(11)通“罌”。
(12)通“鸚”。参见“嬰母”。
(13)姓。

孾字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　孾； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页281第07
【玉篇】音纓。孩也。

孾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
孾字的起名意思

暂无。

Spouse
Basic explanation of words
Spouse
yīng
Ancient with "infant".
Spouse
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīng］
["Guangyun" Yu Yingqie, calm and clear, shadow. ]
Also known as "孆1". Also known as "孾1". The traditional characters of "宝宝1".
(1) Necklace.
(2) Department; wear.
(3) Around; around.
(4) Entanglement; fetters.
(5) Suffer; encounter.
(6) Contact; offend.
(7) Apply.
(8) Newborn girl.
(9) Generally refers to newborns.
(10) Through "Ying". A leather belt that wraps around a horse's neck.
(11) Link "Poppy".
(12) Through "parrot". See "Infant and Mother".
(13) Last name.
Spouse
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Sub Word Department】　孾; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 281 No. 07
[Jade articles] Yin Ying. Child also.
